reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and is comfortable, with one mentioning it matches more expensive options. Customers also consider it fantastic value for money.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great short cocktail dress for plus size ladies!
items.body: I am a plus size woman who usually wears in between size 16 to 18 in dresses. This dress was very cute and flattering. I will note that I am not wearing any shape wear or the proper undergarments in this picture. I quickly snapped this when I was trying it on. It was very comfortable and I felt that I would have been able to move in it easy. It also has just the perfect amount of shimmer in it so it wasn't just a "plain" black dress. Lastly, I have a large chest and often have problems with it not being covered fully when I wear dresses. I appreciated that this dress actually had a button in the area to prevent that from happening. Ultimately, I am returning it because I went with another dress option. However, I would definitely recommend this to a friend if they needed one! Read more
items.author: Samantha S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hoco dress
items.body: I bought this as a HoCo dress for my daughter and we love it!! It’s a great dress especially for the price. It fits just as advertised! My daughter said it’s very comfortable. The sequence in subtle but very pretty and not too heavy on the fabric. Read more
items.author: Santa’s elf

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress but couldn’t use it for what i wanted it for
items.body: It’s not a bad dress, but i was using it for a Halloween costume and i ended up having to get something else due to it not being what i thought it was, 1/5 for my needs but 4/5 for overall dress Read more
items.author: Brittany C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit and comfortable
items.body: I purchased the 20W. I am 250lbs and 5’2. It fit perfectly. The material is soft. I was worried it might be itchy. It was not. It’s very stretchy fabric so very forgiving. Chest area is smaller but I’m smaller chested so it wasn’t an issue but if your bustier be prepared. Read more
items.author: Ash

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not really green
items.body: My dress looks more black than green but it is still good quality. I really hoped for it to look more like the inside of the dress. I laid my boyfriend’s vest next to it, so you can see the difference. Read more
items.author: Victoria Walstad

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely
items.body: My daughter wote this dress for her graduation and she looked lovely in it. No complaints it fit perfect. I did like how it had a snap for the upper breast part so there was no separation of the material falling. She received lots of complaints and it shined lovely when the light would hit it. Read more
items.author: valarie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Super cute. Good quality Read more
items.author: christine

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not flattering
items.body: This dress dated my 16 year old like no other. It was not flattering on her at all. The fabric was flowy but it looked too much like Grandma's dress, than a nice pink sparkling dress. We returned it. Read more
items.author: HardCayndii

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: short sleeves Green, short sleeves Burgundy, long sleeves Black(long Sleeve), short sleeves Pink, long sleeves Dark Green (Long Sleeve), short sleeves Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
